body: Not gonna lie, as soon as page 123 came, and the mother got called by Kuroda-sensei, I somewhat guessed how it would go, and I really, really hoped for a much happier, oyakodon-level, reverse-NTR ending in which the young stud completely outbursts the pair of doms and have the teach end up fired. I guess that's just me being reminded that, in this world, IRL, you need to cheat your way with GHB and blackmail if you ever want to have sex.
